about.title: ABOUT US
content: MDian is a custom software development company founded in 2019. We are a leading technology company with a strong track record of developing innovative applications from scratch.

Our main business covers a wide range of industries and fields, including blockchain, artificial intelligence, the Internet of Things, SaaS, education, and healthcare. We are committed to providing our clients with high-quality, cost-effective software development services to help them achieve their business goals.

We have a team of experienced engineers with a proven track record of delivering projects on time and to high standards. We also offer post-sales support to help our clients resolve any issues they may encounter while using our software.
If you are looking for a leading software development company that can help you achieve your business goals, please contact Mandian Information Technology today.

swcx.title: A geological data analysis platform
items: Through geological data, displaying three-dimensional models can realize two-dimensional slice display and comprehensively view geological conditions
It can be deployed by multiple enterprises and projects, and each project contains multiple geological points to achieve point status management.
Applied to rail transit, bridges, hydropower pipelines and other scenarios that require geological analysis

gsp.title: SevenGoldenGates
items: A geological data analysis platform
Through geological data, displaying three-dimensional models can realize two-dimensional slice display and comprehensively view geological conditions
It can be deployed by multiple enterprises and projects, and each project contains multiple geological points to achieve point status management.
Applied to rail transit, bridges, hydropower pipelines and other scenarios that require geological analysis

mpoc.title: MPOC NFT Music Market
items: Support ERC1155, compatible with mainstream NFT trading platforms such as OpenSea
Support a variety of audio and video formats, support a variety of decoding specifications and music protection
Modern online player, support for collections, collections of musicians, etc.
Multiple transaction models and multi-currency payment, safe and efficient
